Published October 28 2014

Twitter and IBM bring social data to enterprise.

Twitter and IBM bring social data to enterprise. — Under the new partnership, IMB gets access to the all of Twitter’s tweets, and Twitter gets access to IMB’s Watson. Loads of interesting possibilities here.

Enjoy your day.
